LinkItem.internal_link_text: Use SSH with Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight from Linux, OS X, and Unix

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: LEVELS = foreach LOGS generate REGEX_EXTRACT($0, '(TRACE|DEBUG|INFO|WARN|ERROR|FATAL)', 1) as LOGLEVEL;

tr.td: FILTEREDLEVELS = FILTER LEVELS by LOGLEVEL is not null;
Removes rows that contain a null value for the log level and stores the results into FILTEREDLEVELS.
Groups the rows by log level and stores the results into GROUPEDLEVELS.
FREQUENCIES = foreach GROUPEDLEVELS generate group as LOGLEVEL, COUNT(FILTEREDLEVELS.LOGLEVEL) as COUNT;
Creates a new set of data that contains each unique log level value and how many times it occurs. This is stored into FREQUENCIES.
RESULT = order FREQUENCIES by COUNT desc;
Orders the log levels by count (descending) and stores into RESULT.
